attributes.action: Stop RMT & ASLEF unions from further strikes on Govia Thameslink Railway lines.
attributes.additional_details: Strikes have not helped resolving the Driver Operated Only doors dispute with GTR and will not benefit any of the stakeholders if more are called.
attributes.background: The government should call on the unions to stop further strikes on GTR railways. Several months of striking in 2016/17 has achieved nothing but misery for commuters and passengers, who's lives have been severely disrupted. Further strikes have been threatened by the unions will continue to do so.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government to do to help commuters.

You may wish to sign the following petition on strikes:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/181403
